means: （包括新西兰、夏威夷、萨摩亚等中太平洋群岛的）波利尼西亚的，与波利尼西亚相关的

sentence.Network_en: Cook a Polynesian feast or an ancient Roman banquet.
sentence.Network_cn: 做一桌波里尼西亚宴席或古罗马盛宴.

sentence.Network_en: The term taboo derives from various Polynesian languages where it has the sense of'forbiden '.
sentence.Network_cn: 禁忌这个词来自各种波希米亚语,在波希米亚语中,禁忌这个词有着“禁止 ” 的含义.

sentence.Network_en: We were attracted by the amazing performance of the Polynesian dancers.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们被波利尼西亚舞蹈演员精彩的表演所吸引.

PerfectNetExp.abs: ...原住民，俗称“山地人”（对应古早俗称“平地人“的外来汉族） ，他们的语言属于“玻利尼西亚系(polynesian)”，相较于、罗马、、中国等的古文明，发展没有那么深远，文字比较简单。许多字音，是多重意义、共用的。.

RelatedPhrase.word: remote ancestors of the polynesian peoples

list.key: remote ancestors of the polynesian peoples
list.abs: the remote ancestors of the polynesian peoples ., 波利尼西亚人的祖先.

means.word_mean: 1. a native or inhabitant of Polynesia

auth_sentence.content: Some forms of Polynesian culture were lost for many years.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: Some forms of Polynesian culture were lost for many years.

auth_sentence.content: The event concludes in Samoa, a remote Polynesian archipelago in the South Pacific, later Saturday.

sentences.cn: 一个波利尼西亚妇女或妻子
